menuItemSendSelection.description: Title of context menu item that sends a selection to Notado when clicked.

menuItemSendCommentLink.description: Title of context menu item that sends a permalink to Notado when clicked.

menuItemSendThreadReaderLink.message: Send Twitter Thread Link to Notado
menuItemSendThreadReaderLink.description: Title of context menu item that sends a Thread Reader link to Notado when clicked.

notificationTitleNotado.description: Title of the notification when an item has been successfully sent.

notificationTitleTryAgain.description: Title of the notification when an item has failed to send.

notificationMessageTryAgain.message: Try again in a few moments
notificationMessageTryAgain.description: Message of the notification when an item failed to send.

notificationTitleUnsupportedLink.description: Message of the notification when an item failed to send.

notificationMessageOnlyTheseWebsites.message: Only comment links from supported websites can be saved
notificationMessageOnlyTheseWebsites.description: Message of the notification when an item failed to send.

menuItemKullishPage.description: Title of context menu item that sends the page to Kullish by Notado when clicked.

menuItemKindleImport.description: Title of context menu item that saves Kindle highlights to Notado when clicked.
